divs: Sighting Detailson my 7th birthday i was living in a place called takilma oregon it is a small valley only a couple miles wide on the oregon california border about 50 miles inland from ocean. it was almost every night during the summer of 1968 and 1969 we would see theses ships sitting up on the ridge in the treeline at least 2 - 5 ships almost every night as a child i didnt know it was abnormal as all the people i was with were into the hippy thing so it was never scary to me . on the night i saw one it was sitting up on the ridge about 2 miles from me and i was riding my bike up the road with a woman who was with me we had left a party and i was riding her home on my new bike. all of the sudden one of the ufos does like a l shaped approach it comes off the mou8ntain and down into the valley and comes right up to us. it sits there hovering above our head for about 15-30 seconds. and then it retraces its path in an l shape backward and to the side and goes back up on the ridge line and sits with the other ships there i want to say there was about 4-6 ships there that night. i have never forgotten this incident and it was a nightly occurance to see these ships everynight all summer long they would sit and watch us . and we would watch them as far as i know we were never harmed although i sometimes wonder if they did do something to us . i never have felt normal like i fitted in with society. but thats my account of the event as i saw it from the eyes of a 7 year old oh its measurement was approx 50-75 feet around and to me it was a big circular globe that had the same irridecense as the moon it glowed bright white like the moon no flashing lights no windows just bright white balloon perfect circle and it was fast it moved 2-4 miles in a matter of 3 seconds. i am willing to talk to anyone about this so feel free to ask me anything. thanks for letting me share my interaction with you. i was elated after it came and looked at us i felt like it was saying hello . i never felt to scared i mean im sure i was but it wasnt a really like screaming crying thing it only lasted a second and it was more like i was in awe
Summary: ufo came across the valley and stopped about 100 ft from us
